mapper.select:
select lg_shop_uid,qd_gm_pay,qd_fb_time,qd_sesame,qd_loanpay,qd_username,qd_region,qd_age,qd_professional, qd_often,qd_social,qd_plicy,qd_assets,qd_income,qd_units,qd_fund,qd_time,qd_sex from qd_basicmanager where 3>qd_gshop_status and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,qd_fb_time, now())>=1 and qd_sesame>=#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.minSesame} and #{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.maxSesame}>=qd_sesame and qd_age>=#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.minAge} and #{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.maxAge}>=qd_age and qd_loanpay>=#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.minLimit} and #{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.maxLimit}>=qd_loanpay
and qd_plicy like "有保单"
and qd_plicy like "无保单"
and qd_credit like "有信用卡"
and qd_credit like "无信用卡"
and (qd_often like "专科" OR qd_often like "本科" OR qd_often like "大学" OR qd_often like "博士" OR qd_often like "研究生")
and (qd_often like "本科" OR qd_often like "大学" OR qd_often like "博士" OR qd_often like "研究生")
and qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.cityName}),"%")
and qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.city}),"%")
and qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.city}),"%")
and (qd_social like "有社保" or qd_assets like "%有房%" or qd_assets like "%有车%" or qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%" )
and qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%"
and qd_assets like "%有车%"
and qd_assets like "%有房%"
and qd_social like "有社保" and qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%"
and qd_assets like "%有房%" and qd_assets like "%有车%"
and qd_social like "有社保" and qd_assets like "%有房%" and qd_assets like "%有车%" and qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%"
ORDER BY qd_loanpay desc
ORDER BY qd_loanpay desc
ORDER BY qd_time asc
ORDER BY qd_loanpay asc
ORDER BY qd_sesame desc
LIMIT #{searchConditions.numberOfInitial},#{searchConditions.numberOfBranches}

select lg_shop_uid,qd_gm_pay,qd_fb_time,qd_sesame,qd_loanpay,qd_username,qd_region,qd_age,qd_professional, qd_often,qd_social,qd_plicy,qd_assets,qd_income,qd_units,qd_fund,qd_time,qd_qq,qd_wechat,qd_phone,qd_sex from qd_basicmanager where qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.city}),"%")
and qd_card like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.searchBox}),"%") or qd_username like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.searchBox}),"%") or qd_phone like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.searchBox}),"%")
and date(qd_fb_time) between #{searchConditions.startTime} and #{searchConditions.stopTime}
ORDER BY qd_fb_time desc
ORDER BY qd_loanpay desc
ORDER BY qd_time asc
ORDER BY qd_loanpay asc
ORDER BY qd_sesame desc

select lg_shop_uid,qd_gm_pay,qd_fb_time,qd_sesame,qd_loanpay,qd_username,qd_region,qd_age,qd_professional, qd_often,qd_social,qd_plicy,qd_assets,qd_income,qd_units,qd_fund,qd_time,qd_qq,qd_wechat,qd_phone,qd_sex from qd_basicmanager
where qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.city}),"%")
and qd_card like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.searchBox}),"%") or qd_username like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.searchBox}),"%") or qd_phone like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.searchBox}),"%")
and qd_sesame>=#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.minSesame} and #{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.maxSesame}>=qd_sesame and qd_age>=#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.minAge} and #{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.maxAge}>=qd_age and qd_loanpay>=#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.minLimit} and #{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.maxLimit}>=qd_loanpay
and qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{privatePersonalSubscriptionsModel.cityName}),"%")
and qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.city}),"%")
and qd_region like concat(concat("%",#{searchConditions.city}),"%")
and qd_plicy like "有保单"
and qd_plicy like "无保单"
and qd_credit like "有信用卡"
and qd_credit like "无信用卡"
and (qd_often like "专科" OR qd_often like "本科" OR qd_often like "大学" OR qd_often like "博士" OR qd_often like "研究生")
and (qd_often like "本科" OR qd_often like "大学" OR qd_often like "博士" OR qd_often like "研究生")
and (qd_social like "有社保" or qd_assets like "%有房%" or qd_assets like "%有车%" or qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%" )
and qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%"
and qd_assets like "%有车%"
and qd_assets like "%有房%"
and qd_social like "有社保" and qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%"
and qd_assets like "%有房%" and qd_assets like "%有车%"
and qd_social like "有社保" and qd_assets like "%有房%" and qd_assets like "%有车%" and qd_fund like "%有本地公积金%"
and date(qd_fb_time) between #{searchConditions.startTime} and #{searchConditions.stopTime}
ORDER BY qd_fb_time desc
ORDER BY qd_loanpay desc
ORDER BY qd_time asc
ORDER BY qd_loanpay asc
ORDER BY qd_sesame desc
